spanGrp.span: Один человек пришёл (в гости?) к другому человеку.
Er saß langer Zeit, der Mann.
He was sitting for a long time, the man.
Ich weiß nicht, welche Art von Fleisch zu kochen.
I don't know which kind of meat to cook.
Er schätzte sein Fleisch [zu sehr], um [es] zu kochen(?).
He cherished his meat [too much] to cook [it](?).
But the [other] man wanted to eat.
